name: BasketballInsider
0:
”Alexa, open Basketball Insider.”
”Alexa, ask Basketball Insider about Zion Williamson.”
”Alexa, ask Basketball Insider what's going on.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: basketball insider
des:
This skill will provide you the top news stories around the league. It also has the functionality to tell you the most recent news stories on a specific player. 

To open this skill, say, "Alexa, open Basketball Insider."

Then with the skill open, you can say, "What's the latest news" to get the most recent news around the league. Or you can say, "Tell me about James Harden" to get information just on that player. Ask for information on any player you want!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
